text.autoconfig.elytratrails.category.el: Settings that affect your own trails.
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.category.ot: Defaults used for other players/entities (unless overridden by packs).
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.category.se: Networking + safety limits for settings received from other players.
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.title: Elytra Contrails Mod Settings
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: Master toggle: enables/disables every trail type in the mod
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.tran: Lets trails use fading and alpha, but can cause issues with translucency sorting
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.cons: Makes width always the maxwidth, and applies width changes to transparency. ONLY WORKS WHEN TRANSLUCENT TRAILS IS TURNED ON
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: If turned on, you can twirl with the keybinds (look for them in Controls!)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.alwa: Ignore Speed For Trail When Twirling
If turned on, trails will always show when twirling (ignores "speed dependent trail" settings)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.trai: How long the trail should stay for (seconds)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.maxS: How many times the trails should sample position per second
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.spee: Only shows trails when flying at a certain speed (defined below)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.trai: Speed at which to start showing trails (blocks per tick I think?)
Whether the calculated wingtip should change based on the elytra's spread
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: Spawns particles around the player during flight, to show speed
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.part: Range in blocks to spawn particles
Amount "ahead" of you to particles in front of you
Multiple of player velocity to make particles move backwards
Which particle should appear during flight
How many particles should spawn per tick?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.star: How long should it take for trails to reach their max width?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.endR: How long should it take for trails to reach width 0 from the end?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: Should trails have a random factor in their width?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.rand: How much should width change based on randomness?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.useS: Should the trail interpolate between points to make it smoother?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.firs: Time for first person trails to fade in (seconds)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.fade: First person trails fade in with a delay to prevent annoyance
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.emfS: Having this on tries to make it work with EMF models, can cause issues
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.came: Tries to fade trails close to camera to prevent annoyance
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.maxO: Maximum trail width accepted from other players (blocks)
Maximum trail lifetime accepted from other players (seconds)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.sync: If enabled, uses trail settings received over the network for other players
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.shar: If enabled, other users will see your trail settings
If disabled, they will see their default trail on you.
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.show: If disabled, completely hide your trail from other players
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.useS: If enabled, other entities use your 'Your Trails' settings instead of the 'Other's Trails' defaults
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: Default: whether trails render for other entities/players
Default: should other trails have random width variation?
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.useS: Default: smooth other trails by interpolating points
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.spee: Default: only show other trails when they are moving fast enough
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.trai: Default: whether other wingtips move with elytra angle
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.came: Default: fade other trails when close to your camera
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.widt: Default max width for other trails (blocks)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.trai: Default minimum speed for other trails to appear
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.star: Default: distance for other trails to ramp up to max width
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.endR: Default: distance for other trails to ramp down to 0 width
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.colo: Default color for other trails as hex (example: #FFFFFF)
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.rand: Default amount randomness affects other trail width
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.reso: If enabled, resource pack trail configs can override player trails too (falls back to synced/default settings if none exist).
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.prid: Pride flag/Trail texture. Leave blank to disable. Example: rainbow, transgender.  Add new ones into assets/elytratrails/textures/trails
Default Pride flag/Trail texture. Leave blank to disable. Example: rainbow, transgender.  Add new ones into assets/elytratrails/textures/trails
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.enab: Applies to your own trails (elytra + first-person behavior).
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.sync: Server syncing (only works if the mod exists on the server!
text.autoconfig.elytratrails.option.useS: Defaults for other entities/players (Defaults for players unless synced with the server).
